== Tarmac ==

Tarmac is a landing robot (script) that handles the merging of code into branches.

We are using tarmac to handle the merges of the following branches:

* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/bamf|lp:bamf]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/bamf-qt|lp:bamf-qt]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/dee|lp:dee]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/dee-qt|lp:dee-qt]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/libunity|lp:libunity]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/libunity-misc|lp:libunity-misc]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/nux|lp:nux]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/unity|lp:unity]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/unity-2d|lp:unity-2d]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/unity-asset-pool|lp:unity-asset-pool]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/unity-lens-applications|lp:unity-lens-applications]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/unity-lens-files|lp:unity-lens-files]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/+branch/unity-lens-music|lp:unity-lens-music]]</nowiki>

== PPAs ==

We should have two PPAs:

 ppa:unity/daily-trunk::
 :: This contains packages built from trunk
 :: Not guaranteed to pass all the autopilot or X tests
 :: This PPA is for the automated tests, not users
 ppa:unity/daily-stable::
 :: Once the daily-trunk packages have passed the tests, they end up here
 :: All developers and testers should use this PPA
